Ernesto Duany

Fronted Web Developer

Hi there, I’m a 23-year-old aspiring programmer with a strong focus on web development and software engineering. I have a solid understanding of HTML and CSS, and I’m currently building expertise in JavaScript and React. I enjoy exploring how these technologies integrate to create practical, user-friendly solutions. I’m passionate about developing clean, functional projects and committed to continuously improving my skills through hands-on practice and real-world application.

Projects

PeerCode()

PeerCode() is a website for CS students where they can post questions about their code, get feedback from their peers, use their own AI agent that gives them hints on their lines of code so they can learn in a fun and interactive way. Try the demo today!!

View Project

Shopping Cart Website

Developed a fully functional e-commerce shopping cart application using vanilla JavaScript with features including dynamic product display, real-time cart management, quantity controls, and a payment system with change calculation.

View Project

Personal Portfolio using DOM

Built a responsive personal portfolio website featuring dynamic project showcase with interactive navigation, real-time form validation, and asynchronous data loading from JSON files.

View Project

Simple Restaurant Website

This project serves as a good foundation for a complete restaurant website which will implement DOM functionality and a shopping cart so customers can self check out.
